like KH!

messages.subject: video days
messages.msgSnippet: I wanted to tell everyone about our video games. We rented Mario party a  month ago or so, and the kids and I had such a good time with it. We decided we
messages.messageBody:
I wanted to tell everyone about our video games. We rented Mario
party a month ago or so, and the kids and I had such a good time
with it. We decided we wanted to buy it, at which point Josh
explained that there were seven versions! I was shocked, but we
talked about it for a while, and he called around to all the used
game stores to see which versions they had, and how much they were.
We went to Toys R Us (just he and I) and played all the different
versions, and then agreed which one we liked best. In the end, when
he was camping this weekend with the scouts, i went to Game Stop and
bought his favorite version, along with a membership card. He was so
thrilled to come home and find that on his desk. I felt like I did
something right!
We played it Sunday afternoon, most of Monday and a great deal of
yesterday.
We also went and bought Narnia yesterday, so we're waiting til
everyone is awake today, and going to pop a big bowl of popcorn and
watch it as many times as we want ;-) It's making the chickenpox go
by much more quickly! Whew!

Melissa
Mom to Josh (11), Breanna (8), Emily (7), Rachel (6), Sam (4), Dan
(2), and Avari Rose

share our lives at
http://360.yahoo.com/multimomma
